item.description:
What are Merkaba energy flows and what does this have to do with Advanced Energy Healing?

How does the energetic encoding of our DNA template regulate how we process cosmic energy flows?

what is the difference between cosmic Merkaba flows and Merkaba vehicles?

These topics will be discussed at this month's Meetup.

In order to get a little background ahead of time, attendees are requested to view the definition of Merkaba here:

http://www.keylonticd...

In order to understand what DNA encoding and Merkaba flows have to do with preparing for energy shifts occuring in 2012, this month's Meetup will also include a brief overview of the multi-dimensional structure of our cosmos.

Differences between various merkaba types discussed will include their possible destinations, as well as limitations.

The condition of our planet's merkaba will also be discussed, as well as what effect the rapid shifts of earth's Merkaba in 2012 will have upon populations residing here.

Counter-rotating spin rates will also be provided, as well as a technique to begin to reset your own Merkaba spin rates.

As additional preparation for this Meetup, members are requested to take the time to view all 3 FREE on-line video presentations via this link:

http://www.krystalspi...

Total viewing time is approximately 6 hours. Since detailed diagrams are presented, making a list of questions which arise while viewing is recommended.

Many people find it helpful to view all portions repeatedly, since these concepts are generally unknown and they understand better once they become familiar with the terminology and the history.

This Meetup adjourns at 9:00 PM. Please bring your own refreshments.

DIRECTIONS: Get on I-93 from wherever you are. We are approx. half an hour north of Concord, NH.

Get off on exit 22. At the end of the ramp go North on Rt. 127 (toward Gaza). In approx. 1.5 miles you will come to a stop sign.

Turn left, going North on Rt 132. Watch for mailbox number 298 on the right side of the road, approx. 1.5 mi. up. A tan building with semi-circular window is across the street, on the left side.

Go up the first driveway into the property, which has a Meetup sign at the end. Do NOT go up the second driveway which has a sign "ULCS Clinic". No parking is allowed there, so if you get that far, turn around in that driveway and go back and up the first driveway.

Enter through the front door, where you will see another Meetup sign. No need to knock. Just go on in and down the stairs and have a seat in the classroom. If you are arriving early for a private appointment, have a seat in the waiting room instead.
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign at end of first driveway and on front door. No need to knock. Meeting is in downstairs classroom.
item.name: Merkaba Mechanics and Self-Help Energy Techniques VITAL to complete by Dec. 2012
